description: Scrape any website instantly and get consistent structured data         in seconds without writing any css selector code

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.info: Your JigsawStack API key for authentication

inputs.name: url
inputs.info: URL of the page to scrape. Either url or html is required, but not both.

inputs.name: html
inputs.info: HTML content to scrape. Either url or html is required, but not both.

inputs.name: element_prompts
inputs.info: Items on the page to be scraped (maximum 5). E.g. 'Plan price', 'Plan title'

inputs.name: root_element_selector
inputs.info: CSS selector to limit the scope of scraping to a specific element and its children
